name: UFGItemPickedUpDependency
comment:
Dependency that's met if we have picked up all selected items at least once
only items with mRememberPickUp set to true will be remembered when picked up

properties.name: mItems
properties.comment: The items that should have been picked up for this dependency to be met

properties.name: mRequireAllItemsToBePickedUp
properties.comment: Do we need to have picked up all of the items to or is it enough with just one of them
